about_the_game:
Rose-Crimson is a young, energetic girl who wants to know all the joys of life.

Unfortunately, fate was cruel to her, when Bagryana turned 10 years old, her father gave her to the Witch as payment for a debt. And for ten years, the beautiful Rose has been blooming in the foggy forest, far from people and whose life she deserves.

But the time of change has come, mysterious guests are arriving, and the Witch is busy and full of worries, so it's time to escape to freedom.

Features:

- Behind each choice is one of the characteristics that affect the character of the heroine:

o Garden rose, will make the heroine gentle and sympathetic, who thinks about others, it is easier for her to find favor with people around her.

o Wild rose will make the heroine purposeful and prudent, will help to go to the goal and get what she wants, despite the difficulties.

- Elections affect the attitude of the characters to the main character, which will affect the plot and the ending of the story.

- Two full-fledged love interests and interesting interactions with them:

o Stories that are available as you progress through the story.

o Hidden, which are available with certain, non-obvious choices.

o Special ones that are available when wild or garden roses are highly pumped.

- Several endings that change depending on your choices, the attitude of secondary characters to you and your favorite.

- Immerse yourself in an exciting story in a fantasy Ukrainian setting.

short_description: A fantasy-adventure visual novel with choices that affect the heroine's character and the ending she arrives at. Meet the residents of the Misty Witch's estate and get close to her mysterious guests. Love, friendship and hatred in a fascinating story.
